subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Thanks to all for your file replies
author: Lisby
full_text:
Bruce, the weather files were really interesting. I'm taking note of  
the best recoding in the rain comment and see if applies to me down  
here. I was already getting a bit of feeling that sunny days weren't  
good myself.

:)

Ann
